response.original_title: Make Some Room: The Rebirth of The Legendary Haus of Marciano
response.overview: We meet the NYC Chapter of the Haus of Marciano weeks before the highly-anticipated Blond Ball, where the Marcis plan to storm the Kiki ballroom scene with new leaders and talent after a temporary hiatus. The ball marks a new era for Marciano, as they plan to storm the event with both longtime leaders and fresh talent. Experienced figures like Charlie, Carter, and Will have upheld Marciano's legacy, while new leaders like Prince and Ariah declare visions for the future. Meanwhile, friends and house members, Ziggy and Badu, prepare to hit the floor with their house siblings. Culminating in lively performances at the ball, the Marcis set the tone for a new chapter.
response.title: Make Some Room: The Rebirth of The Legendary Haus of Marciano
